Text.Language: V/e~taftwnf e~bolqen n/eymwout ouoh afsenaf e~p~swi e~niv/oui afhemci caouinam m~Pefiwt: afi~ e~qoun e~t,wra n~,/mi: cw] m~mon ouoh nai nan.
who rose from the dead and has ascended into the heavens and is seated at the right hand of His Father, entered into the land of Egypt. Save us and have mercy on us.

who rose from the dead and has ascended into the heavens and is seated at the right hand of His Father. Save us and have mercy on us.
